ygData.subject: Re: Happy --etc
ygData.msgSnippet: whoo.. made it from Level 5 to Level 8 on my days off. Druid boy has meditate now. Having fun Rooting, Blasting, Medding. Never been great at the kite-- but
ygData.messageBody:
whoo.. made it from Level 5 to Level 8 on my days
off. Druid boy has meditate now. Having fun Rooting,
Blasting, Medding. Never been great at the kite-- but
learning. But anyway... on to actual reply stuff.
<br><br>1) Velious-- anyone know what they mean about a
Velious patch button? I don't get a button that says
Velious. Gluck in getting Vel. I got it even though it's
useless to me for now (only lvl 8). <br><br>2) Will look
forward to looking for that new website. Gluck with
that<br><br>3) Drinal Druid =) FatedHue-- having terrible LD
problems on that server--but all in all...
good.<br><br>shooman out
